title: General
fullText:
In New Zealand only, this Section is intended to be applied where the safety of an existing installation should be of a higher standard than that which applied at the time(s) of original construction of the various parts of the installation; but where full compliance with the current requirements for a new installation is not warranted or required.
Compliance with this Section should extend the safe life of the installation.
An installation which is to be assessed for compliance with this Section shall first be assessed in accordance with Sections 3, 4, and 5.
Installations intended to meet requirements for enhanced safety shall be assessed in accordance with Clause 6.2 and the relevant clause as follows:
(a) See Clauses 6.2 and 6.3 for domestic and residential installations or part-installations.
(b) See Clauses 6.2 and 6.4 for educational and childcare facilities.
